N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 15.6 - Limitations on use of consecutive two-physician certificate admission

State Regulations
A patient admitted to a hospital upon an application and
certificate of two physicians, pursuant to section
31.27
of
the Mental Hygiene Law, may be continued in such hospital upon another
two-physician certification pursuant to such section only upon condition that
an application be made, within 72 hours of the filing of such second
application, for a court order, pursuant to section
31.33
of
the Mental Hygiene Law, authorizing continued retention of such patient. If
application for such court order is not made within 72 hours, the patient shall
be discharged. Notes
